ShadowStrike.Narrative: launches a dark, unseen strike from the shadows.

TimeRipple.Narrative: creates a ripple in the fabric of time, slowing and confusing the enemy.

AetherBlast.Narrative: unleashes a powerful blast of pure aether energy.

VoidPulse.Narrative: emits a pulse of void energy, instilling fear into its target.

ArcaneMissile.Narrative: conjures and releases a missile of arcane energy at the target.

InfernoWrath.Narrative: summons a searing inferno to engulf its foes.

EtherealChains.Narrative: binds the target with chains made from ethereal energy, rendering them immobile.

GlacialSpike.Narrative: hurls a spike of ice, freezing the enemy upon impact.

PoisonDart.Narrative: shoots a dart laced with lethal poison.
